location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 56: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell reports that he has despatched to Shiraz a case of stationery for the use of Her Majesty's Mission at Tehran. Hennell states that the Agent at Shiraz has been instructed to forward the case to Tehran.
